item.title: Online Healing Rooms
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: We have a vision to offer 24-7 on demand Healing ministry to anyone, at anytime, from anywhere in the world. We have launched an online healing room through The Spokane Healing Rooms and the International Association of Healing Rooms (Cal Pierce). Through this cutting edge ministry we are able to offer anyone healing ministry through the internet, in an instant messaging or video messaging chat room. We have seen miracles, healings and even deliverance take place through the internet. There is truly no time or distance in the realm of Heaven and just like the centurion (Mattthew 8:5-13) or the Canaanite woman (Matthew 15:22-28), people are healed long distance. If you would like to be considered for an online healing warrior position or to be an intercessor for this ministry, please fill out the contact us form near the bottom. Receive online healing | Support us financially

item.title: Mark & Cathy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Mark & Cathy Kuntz are XP (Extreme Prophetic) Web pastors, and associate itinerants who have served with XP for six years. God has recently led them to serve with the Spokane Healing Rooms Team, (whom they are ordained under), building an online Healing Room with a vision for offering 24-7 on-demand healing ministry to anyone, at anytime, from anywhere in the world.  They are the founders of Greater Works Healing Ministry. Their passion is to equip the church to carry the heart, love and character of Jesus Christ to the captives outside of the four walls of the church, especially in emotional and physical healing. This passion also includes releasing  the body of Christ into the end time Healing Harvest by training and equipping the church to live in a lifestyle of divine health and in ministering healing to the nations. They truly believe “ all things are possible” and love to lead teams into the market place for prophetic evangelism and healing. They offer Healing Schools where they teach people to walk in divine health and minister healing to the world as a lifestyle, taking teams to the streets to show them how easy it is to love on needy people. In the process many are healed, saved, delivered and touched by the Fathers love.  Invite them to minister in your church!

item.title: Greater Works
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Greater Works was founded by Mark and Cathy Kuntz. We have a vision to usher in the end time healing harvest by teaching people how to walk in divine healing, minister healing to others, do market place ministry and leading teams out on the streets to heal, save and deliver. We are very passionate about revival, miracles and healings and believe the core of the gospel is revival and restoration of the entire man, spirit, soul and body. We have also helped establish worldwide online healing rooms with the International Association of Healing Rooms. We truly believe that all things are possible to those who believe in God. If you'd like to support Greater Works by through intercession or with another gift or talent, fill out the contact us form below. Invite Mark & Cathy | Support us financially

item.title: What We Believe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
1. We believe Jesus Christ is not only the Son of God, but came to earth as God in the flesh.  John 1:1-14
  2. We believe the only way (relationship with God), to the Father is through Jesus Christ.  John 14:6
  3. We believe the only way to enter heaven (eternal life) is through faith in Jesus Christ.  Romans 10:9-11
  4. We believe that the only way to salvation (freedom from eternal judgment) is by God’s grace, through Jesus Christ.  Ephesians 2:8-9
  5. We believe that without faith (opposite of works) it is impossible to please God.  Hebrews 11:6
  6. We believe that faith without works is dead (useless) and that works without faith is dead (useless).  James 2:14-24
  7. We believe that Jesus emptied Himself (stripped Himself) of His Godhead (deity) and humbled Himself as a man on earth.  Philippians 2:6-11
  8. We believe Jesus did nothing on earth (performing countless miracles and healings) as God, but as a man, anointed of the Holy Spirit.  Luke 4:1, 14, John 5:19.
  9. We believe that we (the Body of Christ), His disciples, are all commissioned to heal the sick, raise the dead, cleanse the lepers (heal diseases) and cast out demons.  Mark 16: 15-20, Matthew 10:1,8, Mark 6:7,12-13, John 14:12-14, 15:7, 15:16, 16:23, 17:18 , Ephesians 4:11-16, Acts 5:12-16, 1st John 4:17, 3:2
  10. We believe that all believers (all those that claim Jesus Christ as their Savior and Lord) will do even greater works (miracles, healings, signs and wonders ) than Jesus did.  John 14:12
  11. We believe that we as believers were sent, just like Jesus was sent to the earth, to destroy all the works of the devil and to enforce satan's defeat.  John 17:18, 1st John 3:8
  12. We believe that our power source to enforce satan's defeat, is only through the promise of the Father, the Holy Spirit. Acts 2:33
  13. We believe if any person does not possess the Holy Spirit, that they do not belong to Jesus Christ, that they are not truly a child of God.  Romans 8:9, 14 (Amplified)
  14. We believe that relationship with Holy Spirit, and the use of His gifts is what marks the New Testament church (His Children) as His own.  John 16:7, John 14:26, 1st Corinthians 12, 2nd Timothy 3:5
  15. We believe that faith should only be in God’s Word, His logos (the written Word) and His rhema, the living Word, Jesus Christ.  Hebrews 4:12, John 1:1-14
According to John 17:18 just as Jesus was sent to the earth by the Father, we also are sent into the world.  Jesus perfectly represented the Father (John 17:6 ) in the world, demonstrating His outrageous grace and love for mankind, through healing the sick, raising the dead, cleansing the lepers and casting out demons.  Just as Jesus represented the Father, now we are to perfectly represent the Son, by doing exactly what He did.  Jesus was our supreme example of what His Body is to do on this earth, to represent Him. We too are sent to destroy the works of the devil, through intimate relationship with Holy Spirit, by healing the sick, raising the dead, cleansing the lepers and casting out demons. The core truth of the simple message of the gospel is revival, the manifestation of God’s love and power over all the power of the enemy. We are here to enforce satan's defeat at every turn.

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Thank you for your financial support. Have you checked out our blog, or browsed our store yet?  Also check out our videos, listen to our podcasts or view some our photos.  Have fun while you're here.

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!
